title: cant use
body: I no longer have the email this account is under and i forgot my password so what do i do? i don't have any info on this account'

replies.body: Don't worry, we can help!  Reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so our account team can take a look, and help update your info.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
